Name: CAVE VR
About the game: *Only supports Oculus but not other machines, sorry for any inconvenience caused Game Story Outline : The player plays an explorer who is accidentally trapped in an ancient mysterious cave. There are messages of ancient residents left in the cave, leading the explorer to operate the ruins in the cave. The clues along the way seem to imply a long story. Is the end of the ruins the exit of the cave, or the bottomless darkness? What kind of game is this ? CAVE It is a puzzle-solving 3DVR game. Players will play the role of explorers to explore the ruins in the cave, and try to escape from the cave by interacting with the scene organs to solve puzzles. Gameplay : Interact with the ruins in the ruins to unlock the seal of the ruins There are various puzzles waiting for players to solve Game Featuresï¼š Immersive virtual ancient ruins, unique immersive art scenes. Solve puzzles using interaction mechanisms corresponding to scene objects. Objects and environmental changes in the ruins will suggest the direction of the plot.
